wysiwyg_a.p: This function block implements an event splitter. One input event generates two output events.

wysiwyg.p: An event at the 'EI'-Event input generates two events while the first is passed to the 'EO1'-Event output and the second to the 'EO2'-Event output.
Because it is technically not possible that two events emerge completely simultaneously, they will emerge barely consecutively.
